name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: Some magic happened last night in Cleveland. The Cleveland Browns beat the New York Jets for their first win since 2016. To put that in perspective, the last time the Browns won, Trump wasn't president and Kevin Spacey was. Congratulations to the Browns. They're now 1-1-1. And this gives hope to another team that is hoping to score its first win since 2016 â€” the Democrats. Today a blockbuster report from the failing New York Times that claims Deputy Attorney General Rod Rosenstein, who's supervising the Russia investigation, in May of last year floated the idea that he wear a wire to secretly record conversations with the president so he could document just how bad things were. Donald Trump's White House has more people wearing microphones than Donald Trump's "Apprentice" had people wearing microphones.
